mapper.insert: INSERT INTO travle.t_hotel (hotelid, hotelname, in_time, out_time, pic, hotelareaid, roomtypeid, context, room_count, site, hotelphone, price) VALUES (0, #{hotelname}, #{intime}, #{outtime}, #{pic}, #{hotelareaid}, #{roomtypeid}, #{context}, #{roomcount}, #{site}, #{hotelphone}, #{price});

update t_hotel
